item.title: MICRON TECHNOLOGY INC 10-K
item.description: MICRON TECHNOLOGY INC, which is in the Semiconductors & Related Devices [3674] industry, SEC 10-K filing on October 07, 2022 had 29360 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
